name: 光電系統量測專題研究
restrict: ◎必須先修過【OEC9105  光電半導體】 ◎課程不開放上修
goals: Introduce the measurement system required for optoelectronic semiconductor components, and cultivate students to use the knowledge and technology of optoelectronic physics and optoelectronic engineering to understand the problems related to the measurement of optoelectronic components.
To equip students with the skills, skills and the ability to use instruments and tools required for practical operation of optoelectronic measurement systems.

From the teaching and practical operation of measuring optoelectronic components, students are trained to think independently, analyze and solve problems, and lay the foundation for students' life-long learning.
To cultivate students' teamwork attitude through practical discussion.
Through the guidance and discussion of academic papers by instructors, students develop professional ethics attitudes and the belief of having an international outlook and serving the society.
syllabus:
【Teaching method: 16+2 weeks】

Week 1  Introduction

Week 2  Solid State Optics Review

Week 3  Semiconductor Component Physics Review

Week 4  Introduction to Photoluminescence Excitation Spectroscopy

Week 5  Practical operation of photoluminescence excitation spectroscopy

Week 6  Optoelectronic Semiconductor Component Fabrication

Week 7  Introduction and Practical Operation of Electroluminescence Excitation Spectroscopy

Week 8  Introduction and Practical Operation of Raman Spectroscopy Optics

Week 9  Opto-semiconductor-related industry visits

Week 10  Mid-term report

Week 11  Introduction and Practical Operation of Ellipsometry Spectroscopy

Week 12  Introduction of perovskite quantum dots and analysis of related optoelectronic properties and required measurement systems

Week 13  Introduction of graphene materials and analysis of related optoelectronic properties and required measurement systems

Week 14  Introduction of two-dimensional materials and analysis of related optoelectronic properties and required measurement systems

Week 15  Sharing by Optoelectronic Semiconductor Industry Experts

Week 16  Final report

Week 17  Self-learning

Week 18  Self-learning

methodologies.note: Describe the important concepts and theories of optoelectronic measurement systems, novel optoelectronic materials, components and system application technologies and knowledge, and strengthen thinking about future application fields.
Open classroom discussions and professional-teacher exchanges increase student interaction and communication, and increase student learning benefits.
Practical operation of the relevant optoelectronic component measurement system, enriching the students' practical experience, is conducive to the connection of the optoelectronic industry.

grading.note: Test students' understanding and familiarity with research related to optoelectronic semiconductor components and measurement systems. (Oral report)
Test students' understanding and familiarity with research related to optoelectronic semiconductor components and measurement systems. (Oral report)
The report of visit experience and share feedback. (Written report)

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【OEC9105  Semiconductors for Electro-Optics】 ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
